name: Funny Fire Game (Prototype)
description:
Funny Fire Game

Made by

_UnderscoreFresh  - Lead Director

Dippin - Level Design

dtfe - Programming

KiqeGaming - 3D, Modelling, Textures

Topzi - SFX & Music (Not yet used)

This is a game in where you extinguish fires in a forest.

There are two ways to defeat fires, the fire extinguisher and pissing.

Enjoy our amazing game. ( ͡• ͜ʖ ͡• )

Controls

Walk - W A S D

Jump - Spacebar

Quit - Esc

Interact/ Fill Extinguisher - E

Use Fire Extinguisher - Left Click

Piss - Hold F
